roleset.name: knowledgeable

example.name: All args
example.text: I am sure many of us are well aware of Samuel Huntington 's " Clash of Civilizations " theory , that future conflict would be along cultural lines between " West " , " East " and " Confucian " blocks , whatever they are .
example.arg: of Samuel Huntington 's " Clash of Civilizations " theory , that future conflict would be along cultural lines between " West " , " East " and " Confucian " blocks , whatever they are .

roleset.note: AWARE-J NOTES: Roleset based on BOLT P01. (from aware.01-j)
